title: Handle a Tenant Noise Complaint
description: A tenant complains about excessive noise from a neighboring unit. The property manager must investigate and resolve the issue.

tasks.description: Acknowledge the complaining tenant's email and document the specific times and nature of the noise.
tasks.expected_outcome: The complaint is formally logged in the system.

tasks.description: Contact the tenant who is the subject of the complaint to discuss the issue and remind them of the community's quiet hours policy.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent communicates with the other tenant about the complaint.

tasks.description: If the issue persists, issue a formal lease violation notice to the offending tenant.
tasks.expected_outcome: A formal notice is sent if the informal warning is not effective.
